medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began when the patient was sitting on the couch, presenting with ongoing mid-sternal chest pain radiating down the left arm, epigastric pain, and pleurisy lasting five hours. In the ED, patient reported nausea but was unable to provide additional details.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, Insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus, schizophrenia, pulmonary embolism, chronic cough, gastroesophageal reflux disease, hepatitis C, obesity, patent foramen ovale, tobacco abuse.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of early myocardial infarction, arrhythmia, cardiomyopathies, sudden cardiac death; otherwise non-contributory.
